description: Test the login page with positive and negative credential flows

testCases.name: Successful Login
testCases.description: User should be able to login with valid credentials
steps: User sees page header containing text 'Logged In Successfully'

testCases.name: Failed Login
steps: User sees error message about invalid credentials

testCases.name: Invalid Username
testCases.description: System should reject invalid username format
steps: User sees error message about username format

testCases.name: Missing Password
steps: User sees error message that password is required
